description: Support to export promotion activities of the Azerbaijan Export & Investment Promotion Foundation (AZPROMO).

subproject.corporate outcome: Policies, strategies and partnerships established to enhance public-private sector collaboration and private sector and market development that benefit the poor and ensure that low-income households and small enterprises have access to a broad range of financial and legal services
subproject.description:
The overall strategy of the Project is to support developing a stronger coalition between the public and private sector in export and trade promotion. The Project will emphasize the following activity directions: 
•	Continuing Public Private Dialogue
•	Better quality of services of AZPROMO to foreign and local companies
•	Institutionalization of export promotion / Private medium sized exporters services
•	Export policy lobbying
•	Promoting Azerbaijan as the best place for multinational corporations to establish their regional offices    
•	Image Enhancement 

The overall outcome of the project is to support increases of private investment and exports in the non-oil sectors.  The project focuses on the following strategic priority outputs:

a)	Export and investments in the non-oil sector promoted through strengthening capacities of AZPROMO and facilitation of public – private dialogue. This includes providing training opportunities for the staff of AZPROMO in country and abroad related to human resources management, business certification, communication, marketing, support to organizations of business forums and conferences, country presentations, operationalisation of AZPROMO office in Astana to promote exports from and investments to Azerbaijan. 
b)	Development of an export promotion strategy, surveys as assessment of international competitiveness of Azerbaijan business environment for export promotion, assessment of transactional costs for export operations in Azerbaijan.
c)	Establishment of regional hub for multi-national corporations to Baku and national branding for Azerbaijan. 

The project will also organise discussions on nation branding following the orientation study.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
